user_question: What are the top three emerging trends in e-commerce for 2024, and can you generate an image representing one of these trends?
final_answer: The top three emerging trends in e-commerce for 2024 are: 1) AI-driven personalization, 2) Augmented reality shopping experiences, and 3) Sustainable and eco-friendly packaging. An image representing augmented reality shopping experiences has been generated.
